cross_references.name: Excavating and Loading Machine and Dragline Operators

description.value: Operate or tend machinery equipped with scoops, shovels, or buckets, to excavate and load loose materials. Exclude "Dredge Operators" (53-7031).

job_tasks.value: High risk job tasks associated with this job: Plow, dig, or excavate soil in endemic area Raise dust from bird roosts, chicken coops, or bat-inhabited caves endemic area
